title: macbook 12 SSD problem
message: There are many macbook 12 with SSD problem, macbook doesn't detect Ssd, neither in disk utility or system information. It is a common problem in this model. Is Ssd dead after a short time? Has anyone discovered the cause of this issue. I have checked Ssd voltage and are present and I tried to reflow both Ssd nand

title: macbook 12 SSD problem
message: Hopeless, corrupted NAND, not fixable unless you want to swap NAND chips and controller from a donor board.
